title: Real life heroes act up for Clint Eastwood
text:
Real life heroes act up for Clint Eastwood Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:54 
Director Clint Eastwood re-enacts the 2015 foiled train attack for his latest film and uses the three friends who subdued the terrorist as leads. Rollo Ross reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Director Clint Eastwood re-enacts the 2015 foiled train attack for his latest film and uses the three friends who subdued the terrorist as leads. Rollo Ross reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2silv6u
